text: Searchlight Capital Partners is a private equity firm. Searchlight Capital was established in 2010 by Eric Zinterhofer, Oliver Haarmann, and Erol Uzumeri, its founding partners. It has offices in New York, Conduit Street, London and Toronto. In June 2015, Searchlight Capital (40%) and Liberty Global (60%) jointly acquired Choice Cable TV, Puerto Rico's second largest cable operator, for US$272.5 million. In December 2015, Searchlight Capital closed its second fund with $1.94 billion of commitments. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Private equity firms of the United Kingdom Category:Financial services companies based in London Category:Financial services companies established in 2010 Category:2010 establishments in England
title: Searchlight Capital
